Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to organize desktop flows using tags in Power Automate. This feature will reach general availability on September 30, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, you can create and assign tags to your desktop flows through the console. You can search and filter your flows by tags. This feature makes it easier to manage and find specific flows.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Organize desktop flows using tags.

Title: Power Automate - Organize desktop flows using tags
